Entity.Description: Stores information related to delivery plan. Delivery plan is a complete sequence of movements needed to deliver one or more orders from origin to destination. It consists loads, stops, shipments, origins and destinations. A Delivery Plan includes expected dates of arrival and departure at all start and end points of the plan. A delivery plan is created by including shipments into the plan. Shipments included in a delivery plan are load planned. When all shipments in a delivery plan are included into loads for every leg of the shipment from source to destination, the delivery plan is said to be completely planned. Delivery plan is created and managed by the manageDeliveryPlan API.
Entity.Name: Delivery_Plan

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_DELIVERY_PLAN table.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique key or business key, which by itself identifies a delivery plan.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_No

Attribute.Description: A document type derived from the base document type 1001 - LOAD.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The enterprise that created the delivery plan.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the delivery plan. This could be the enterprise code or any other valid organization in the system. However, it must match at least the enterprise code or seller organization code or buyer organization code of the shipments being added into the delivery plan.
Attribute.Name: Owner_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the delivery plan is planned. This is a computed. When all shipments in a delivery plan are included into loads for every leg of the shipment from source to destination, the delivery plan is said to be planned.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Planned_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the delivery plan is closed. This is a computed field that is used internally as a way to logically mark data for purge so that transactions do not look into this data. This data is later purged by the purge agent at preset intervals.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Closed_Flag

Attribute.Description: A name or reference you may wish to associate with the delivery plan.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Name

Attribute.Description: A date or reference time you may wish to associate with the delivery plan.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Date

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores carrier manifest created during the manifesting process. A manifest is a carrier specific document that comprises of shipments. A manifest is created for a ship node and carrier. At any point in time, there is only one open manifest for a ship node and carrier. Every parcel shipment that is containerized is included in a manifest. Containerization is done using the packShipment and changeShipment API. All shipments included in the manifest are ship confirmed using the closeManifest API. All parcel related carrier services for a carrier are part of a single manifest.
Entity.Name: Manifest

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_MANIFEST table.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Key

Attribute.Description: One of the elements of the unique key or business key, that identifies a manifest. ManifestNo, ShipnodeKey and Scac in unison uniquely identify a manifest.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: Manifest creation date.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Date

Attribute.Description: One of the elements of the unique key or business key, that identifies a manifest. ManifestNo, ShipnodeKey and Scac in unison uniquely identify a manifest.
Attribute.Name: Shipnode_Key

Attribute.Description: One of the elements of the unique key or business key, that identifies a manifest. ManifestNo, ShipnodeKey and Scac in unison uniquely identify a manifest.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: A number provided by the carrier personnel at shipment pickup, that uniquely identifies a pick up. This is usually comprised of a book number and a page number. A pickup summary number is associated with the manifest using the closeManifest API. It should be of 9 digits, out of which first 7 digits represent book number and last 2 digits represent page number.
Attribute.Name: Pickup_Summary_No

Attribute.Description: Number of times the manifest has been printed. This is 0 at creation. This is incremented by 1 at every subsequent print.
Attribute.Name: Print_Count

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the manifest is closed, all shipments included in the manifest are ship confirmed, and no new shipments can be added to this manifest. The manifest is marked closed by the closeManifest API.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Closed_Flag

Attribute.Description: Indicates the status of a manifest. Shipments may be added only to manifests that are in open state.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Status

Attribute.Description: Gives the location where manifest is done.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Location

Attribute.Description: Gives the shippers account number.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Account_No

Attribute.Description: Identifier of the trailer to which, this manifest belongs.
Attribute.Name: Trailer_No

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the manifest contains hazardous items or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Hazmat

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the manifest on External system like Pierbridge.
Attribute.Name: External_Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores picklist created during the picklist creation process. A picklist is a document used for picking. It is generated for a ship node across one or more shipments and contains information on the shipment lines and the quantity for each line that is to be picked. Picklist is created by the printPickList API.
Entity.Name: Pick_List

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PICK_LIST table.

Attribute.Description: The date on which the picklist was created.
Attribute.Name: Pick_List_Date

Attribute.Description: The shipnode key that is associated with this pick list.
Attribute.Name: Shipnode_Key

Attribute.Description: The number of times the picklist has been printed. This is 0 at creation, and is incremented by 1 at every subsequent print.
Attribute.Name: Print_Count

Attribute.Description: A logical way of grouping data in the system, so that different business processes can be applied to the data. The document type on the picklist restricts addition of only those shipments that belong to this document type.

Entity.Description: This table stores load level and shipment level charges. Based on the existence of either load key or the shipment key on a record, a charge is associated with a load or shipment respectively. Charges can be grouped based on charge category and charge name. The invoice corresponding to the charge is posted on each record by the createShipmentInvoice API.
Entity.Name: Load_Shipment_Charge

Attribute.Name: Key_Reference1

Attribute.Description: Any additional payment references.

Attribute.Name: Invoice_No

Attribute.Description: Estimated charge for the load or shipment for the charge category and charge name.

Attribute.Description: Actual charge for the load or shipment for the charge category and charge name.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Charge

Attribute.Description: Shipment for which charges are maintained.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: Load for which charges are maintained.
Attribute.Name: Load_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.

Entity.Description: Stores information about loads. Loads are made of Shipments, carry one or more shipments between two points, and carry an entire shipment. A load has one origin, one destination and can have multiple intermediate stops. A load has one carrier. Loads may or may not belong to a Delivery Plan. A load can pickup a shipment from its origin or an intermediate stop and drop off the shipment to its destination or an intermediate stop. A load is created and managed by the manageLoad API.
Entity.Name: Load

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOAD table.
Attribute.Name: Load_Key

Attribute.Description: The delivery plan that this load belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the load is created by choosing an option in which each shipment is picked up from the shipment origin.
Attribute.Name: Pickup_From_Shipment_Origin

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the load is created by choosing an option in which each shipment is dropped off at the shipment destination.
Attribute.Name: Drop_At_Shipment_Destination

Attribute.Description: The load number.A unique key or business key, which by itself identifies a load.
Attribute.Name: Load_No

Attribute.Description: A document type derived from the base document type 1001 - LOAD.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The pipeline to which this load belongs. This is determined by the manageLoad API based on the document type and several other key attributes of the load.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a load is closed. This is a computed field, which is used internally as a way to logically mark data for purge so that transactions do not look into this data. This data is later purged by the purge agent at preset intervals.
Attribute.Name: Load_Closed_Flag

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the load. This could be the enterprise code or any other valid organization in the system.
Attribute.Name: Owner_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The enterprise that created the load.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The date and time at which the load is expected to depart from its origin stop.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Departure_Date

Attribute.Description: The actual departure date and time of the load from the origin stop.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Departure_Date

Attribute.Description: The date and time at which the load is expected to arrive at the destination stop.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Arrival_Date

Attribute.Description: The actual arrival date and time of the load at the destination stop.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Arrival_Date

Attribute.Description: The ship node corresponding to the origin of this load.
Attribute.Name: Origin_Node

Attribute.Description: The receiving node corresponding to the destination of this load.
Attribute.Name: Destination_Node

Attribute.Description: The origin address key that is associated with this load. An origin stop may be identified alternatively by a stop address.
Attribute.Name: Origin_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The destination address key that is associated with this load. A destination stop may be identified alternatively by a stop address. This is typically the case when receiving or destination nodes are not maintained on the system.
Attribute.Name: Destination_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The status of the load. As various transactions in the load's pipeline act upon the load, the load status changes. Typical values are 1100 - Created, 1150 - Trailer Loaded, 1200 - Intransit, 1300 - Completed.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the last status change took place.
Attribute.Name: Status_Date

Attribute.Description: The user defined load type. This field is used to indicate the composition of the load.
Attribute.Name: Load_Type

Attribute.Description: The estimated charge for transporting all shipments in this load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Estimated_Charge

Attribute.Description: The actual charge for transporting all shipments in this load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Actual_Charge

Attribute.Description: The actual freight charge for transporting all shipments in this load.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Freight_Charge

Attribute.Description: The means of shipping the shipment. The values are usually Land, Air, Sea or Ocean.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Via

Attribute.Description: The seal number on the load.
Attribute.Name: Seal_No

Attribute.Description: The mode of shipment.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Mode

Attribute.Description: The number of the trailer by which the load leaves the origin.
Attribute.Name: Trailer_No

Attribute.Description: The progressive number. It is generated for Loads with shipment mode as LTL, also if shipment mode changes from any other mode to LTL. Re-generation of PRO number happens, when the Carrier changes.
Attribute.Name: Pro_No

Attribute.Description: The carrier that transports this load.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: The carrier service availed for transporting this load.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: The Proof of Delivery number.
Attribute.Name: Pod_No

Attribute.Description: The Bill of Lading number.
Attribute.Name: Bol_No

Attribute.Description: The total weight of the load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in Total_Weight attribute of this load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight_UOM

Attribute.Description: The total volume of the load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of volume specified in Total_Volume attribute of this load.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume_UOM

Attribute.Description: A number which helps the enterprise and the carrier identify the pick up details and any relevant details about the load drop off.
Attribute.Name: Appointment_No

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this load comprises of any shipment that carries an item that is marked hazardous.
Attribute.Name: Hazardous_Material

Attribute.Description: This indicates the name of the vessel used for transportation.
Attribute.Name: Vessel_Name

Attribute.Description: This indicates the vessel's voyage number.
Attribute.Name: Voyage_No

Attribute.Description: The currency corresponding to the load charges.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: A consolidated value that is propagated from the order line. This will be populated if we consider Department Code as a Do Not Mix criteria during the consolidation process.
Attribute.Name: Department_Code

Attribute.Description: A consolidated value that is propagated from the order line. This field will be populated if we consider Item Classification Code as a Do Not Mix criteria during the consolidation process.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification

Attribute.Description: The time when the Carrier specified on the load is expected to come to pick up the load. This field will be populated optionally as part of the custom dynamic routing transaction.
Attribute.Name: CarrierPickupTime

Attribute.Description: The person whom the load is marked for.
Attribute.Name: Mark_For_Key

Attribute.Description: The contact information that is returned by the determineRouting API or by the Response for routing Instructions (EDI 754).
Attribute.Name: Routing_Contact_Info

Attribute.Description: The customer PO # for the order during order creation time. While creating shipments, this value is consolidated across all orders belonging to this shipment and stored in the shipment header.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Po_No

Attribute.Description: The seller organization to which this shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The buyer organization to which this shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The freight terms on the load. This is propagated from the shipment. Can be Collect, Prepaid or 3rd Party.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Terms

Attribute.Description: The information about who supplied us the routing information. Values can be 01 (Supplied by Sterling system), 02 (Pre Assigned), 03 (External System), 04 (User Supplied).
Attribute.Name: Routing_Source

Attribute.Description: The reason code detailing as to why the SCAC could not be determined by the determineRouting API.
Attribute.Name: Routing_Error_Code

Attribute.Description: The field is deprecated and is no longer in use.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Code

Attribute.Description: The account number of the customer or buying organization with the carrier. This is used for arriving at the billing account number. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_bill_account.
Attribute.Name: Custcarrier_Account_No

Attribute.Description: The type of the pack list. This is one of the attributes used in shipment consolidation.
Attribute.Name: Packlist_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicate whether a new shipment can be added to this load or not.
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Consolidate

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the load has any non-resolved hold type.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Flag

Attribute.Description: The manifest key that is associated with this load.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag to indicates whether a load is included in the manifest explicitly. This is set to 'Y' when the user selects the load from the console and adds to a manifest explicitly.
Attribute.Name: Is_Exp_Incl_In_Manifest

Attribute.Description: If carrier integration is availed for the carrier on the shipment, then the carrier server returns this information. This is a unique number assigned to each load when shipped with shipment level integration service.
Attribute.Name: Airway_Bill_No

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the load is dropping shipments to their Break Bulk Node.
Attribute.Name: Is_Break_Bulk_Load

Attribute.Description: The Open Ship Index number to be used for FedEx Shipment Level Integration shipments. It is a generated one-up number.
Attribute.Name: Fedx_Open_Ship_Index

Attribute.Description: The field is used for storing the Internal Transaction Number(ITN), FTSR Exemption Number or XTN returned by Automated Export System(AES) after filing the Shipper's Export Declaration(SED).
Attribute.Name: ITN_No

Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Entity.Description: Stores information about a load stop. A load stop is identified by a stop node - which is a receiving or shipping node on the system, or a stop address in cases where stop nodes do correspond to a receiving node which is not maintained on the system. A load stop is created and managed by the manageLoad API. Certain time related attributes such as actual arrival and departure dates, and the stop reached attribute are updated by the receiveIntransitUpdates API.
Entity.Name: Load_Stop

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOAD_STOP table.
Attribute.Name: Load_Stop_Key

Attribute.Description: The load for which stops are maintained.
Attribute.Name: Load_Key

Attribute.Description: The stop sequence number that determines the load travel path. The origin stop is assigned the sequence no. -1 and the destination stop is assigned the sequence no. 99999. All intermediate stops may be sequenced by the user to fall within this range. Stop Type attribute of the stop determines whether a stop is the origin, destination or an intermediate stop.
Attribute.Name: StopSequenceNo

Attribute.Description: The type of the load stop. There are three types of load stops: O - corresponds to the origin stop, D - corresponds to the destination stop and I - for an intermediate stop.
Attribute.Name: StopType

Attribute.Description: The stop node. A stop node corresponds to a receiving or ship node on the system. The information of such nodes are maintained in YFS_SHIP_NODE entity.
Attribute.Name: Stop_Node

Attribute.Description: The stop address key. A stop may be identified alternatively by a stop address. This is typically the case when receiving or destination nodes are not maintained on the system.
Attribute.Name: Stop_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The date and time at which the load is expected to depart from the load stop.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Departure_Date

Attribute.Description: The actual departure date and time of the load from this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Departure_Date

Attribute.Description: The date and time at which the load is expected to arrive at the load stop.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Arrival_Date

Attribute.Description: The actual arrival date and time of the load at this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Arrival_Date

Attribute.Description: The total weight of the load as it arrives at this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight_In

Attribute.Description: The total weight of the load as it departs from this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight_Out

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in Total_Weight_In and Total_Weight_Out attributes of this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Weight_UOM

Attribute.Description: The total volume of the load as it arrives at this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume_In

Attribute.Description: The total volume of the load as it departs from this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume_Out

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of volume specified in Total_Volume_In and Total_Volume_Out attributes of this load stop.
Attribute.Name: Volume_UOM

Attribute.Description: This flag indicate whether updates have been received for this load stop, and is updated by the receiveIntransitUpdates API.
Attribute.Name: Stop_Reached

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the dock location for the load stop.
Attribute.Name: Dock_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: A number which will help the ship node and the carrier identify the pick up details and any relevant details about the shipment delivery.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Appointment_No

Attribute.Description: The time after which an appointment can be taken by the ship node with the carrier.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Appointment_Date

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores load status change audit. Each time the load status changes because of a business process, an audit is posted along with the status, timestamp, reason code and text, user ID and program ID. All transactions in the load pipeline have entries in this table upon completion of a transaction. In addition, the receiveIntransitUpdates API posts transport status updates for additional transport statuses that are not a part of the delivery (load) pipeline.
Entity.Name: Load_Status_Audit

Attribute.Description: Indicates the transportation status of the load.

Entity.Description: Stores shipment information. A shipment is a collection of order lines which will be shipped as a unit. One or more orders from a buyer organization may be grouped into the same shipment to minimize transportation costs.
Entity.Name: Shipment

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SHIPMENT table.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: A number that indicates a group of shipments which will be picked together. A picklist is a document used for picking. It is generated for a ship node across one or more shipments and contains information on the shipment lines and the quantity for each line that is to be picked. Picklist is created by the printPickList API.
Attribute.Name: Pick_List_No

Attribute.Description: Identifies the original Shipment from which this Shipment has been created.
Attribute.Name: Original_Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Merge_Node

Attribute.Description: A number assigned to group related shipments under one head. This is input by the user.
Attribute.Name: Pickticket_No

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Date

Attribute.Description: The difference of total quantity and placed quantity for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Unplaced_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The ship node where the shipment was created.
Attribute.Name: Shipnode_Key

Attribute.Description: The node that receives the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Receiving_Node

Attribute.Description: Receiving node as identified by the buyer for eg:Store,DC Number.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Receiving_Node_Id

Attribute.Description: It is a consolidation group id that is used as a standard do not mix constraint.Releases belonging to same shipment consolidation group may consolidate to same shipment.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Consolidation_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to identify the mode of shipment. Typical values are TL - Truck Load, LTL - Less Than Truck Load, etc. This attribute can also be used to store any of your own categorizations.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Mode

Attribute.Description: The from address key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: From_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The to address key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: To_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The bill to address key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The ship to identifier. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Customer_Id

Attribute.Description: The bill to customer id that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_Customer_Id

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Has_Other_Shipments

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The means of shipment. This is usually Land, Air, Sea, or Ocean.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Via

Attribute.Description: The seal number on the load.
Attribute.Name: Seal_No

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Tracking_No

Attribute.Description: The trailer number by which the shipment leaves the ship node.
Attribute.Name: Trailer_No

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to store manifest number assigned by carrier server. ManifestKey on shipment is where the actual manifesting related information is stored for the manifesting process in the system.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: The progressive number assigned by a carrier to track a shipment (usually for LTL shipments).
Attribute.Name: Pro_No

Attribute.Description: The carrier by which this shipment will be transported.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: The actual freight charge for transporting the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Freight_Charge

Attribute.Description: The carrier service availed for transporting this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: The requested carrier service code.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: The status of the shipment. As various transactions in the shipment's pipeline act upon the shipment, the shipment status changes. Typical values are 1100 - Created, 1200 - Being Picked, 1400 - Shipped.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The proof of delivery number.
Attribute.Name: Pod_No

Attribute.Description: The bill of lading number.
Attribute.Name: Bol_No

Attribute.Description: The total weight of the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in Total_Weight attribute of this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: The total volume of the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of volume specified in TotalVolume attribute of this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Volume_Uom

Attribute.Description: The total quantity for all non Logical Kit Shipment Lines and Total Quantity across all components for Logical Kit Lines.
Attribute.Name: Total_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The sum of all quantity in the container details for the Shipment.
Attribute.Name: Containerized_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The sum of all placed quantity in the container details for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Placed_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether placing products into container is complete.
Attribute.Name: Is_Product_Placing_Complete

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the Pack Process is complete for all containers in the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Is_Pack_Process_Complete

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the original receiving node is revised for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Is_Revised

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment has any non-resolved hold type.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Flag

Attribute.Description: The license number given by government or customs for shipments going to bonded warehouses.
Attribute.Name: It_No

Attribute.Description: The date on which the IT number was stamped.
Attribute.Name: It_Date

Attribute.Description: A number which helps the ship node and the carrier identify the pick up details and any relevant details about the shipment delivery.
Attribute.Name: Appointment_No

Attribute.Description: The time after which an appointment can be taken by the ship node with the carrier.
Attribute.Name: From_Appointment

Attribute.Description: The time before which an appointment could be taken by the ship node with the carrier.
Attribute.Name: To_Appointment

Attribute.Description: The date at which the shipment is delivered at its intended destination.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Ts

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Code

Attribute.Description: The number of pallets in the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Pallets

Attribute.Description: The number of cartons in the shipment. This field is only an approximation and not accurate depiction of the number of containers in a shipment.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Cartons

Attribute.Description: The tax payer ID of the shipping organization if the shipment is meant for export.
Attribute.Name: Export_Taxpayer_Id

Attribute.Description: The entity that pays the freight. Freight Terms determines whether a shipment is Pre Paid, 3rd Party Billing or Collect Billing.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Terms

Attribute.Description: The field is deprecated and is no longer in use.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Code

Attribute.Description: The type of carrier. This field is denormalized from YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE for the scac and carrier service code on the shipment. Typical values are PARCEL, LTL, and so forth.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Type

Attribute.Description: The number of times that the shipment information has been downloaded from the user interface.
Attribute.Name: Download_Count

Attribute.Description: The currency corresponding to the shipment charges.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: The delivery plan to which this shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Plan_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment number. This is a part of the unique key or business key.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The pipeline to which this shipment belongs. This is determined by the createShipment API based on the document type and several other key attributes of the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment has gift items.
Attribute.Name: Gift_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment is planned. This is a computed field. When every leg of the shipment from source to destination is included into loads, the shipment is said to be planned. This is updated by the manageLoad API.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Planned_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment is closed. This is a computed field, which is used internally as a way to logically mark data for purge so that transactions do not look into this data. This data is later purged by the purge agent at preset intervals. This is updated by the close shipment agent.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Closed_Flag

Attribute.Description: The seller organization to which the shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The buyer organization to which this shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The enterprise to which this shipment belongs.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The shipment date as requested by the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Shipment_Date

Attribute.Description: The shipment date as planned or arrived at in the system.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Shipment_Date

Attribute.Description: The actual shipment date. This is updated by the confirmShipment API.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Shipment_Date

Attribute.Description: The date on which the shipment must be delivered at the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: The date on which the shipment is expected to be delivered at the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: The date on which the shipment was actually delivered at the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: The shipment needs to be returned by this date.
Attribute.Name: Return_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The shipment authorization number for return.
Attribute.Name: Return_Authorization_Number

Attribute.Description: A classification of data on which a particular set of business processes must be applied. In this case, it happens to be the document type of the order document - basically the document type of the orders comprising the shipment. A document type derived from the base document type 0001 - ORDER.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Origin_Zone

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Destination_Zone

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the last status change took place.
Attribute.Name: Status_Date

Attribute.Description: The user-defined shipment type. This is used to indicate the composition of the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Type

Attribute.Description: The commercial or declared value of the shipment for insurance purposes.
Attribute.Name: Commercial_Value

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment carries an item that is marked hazardous.
Attribute.Name: Hazardous_Material_Flag

Attribute.Description: The estimated charge for transporting the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Estimated_Charge

Attribute.Description: The actual charge for transporting the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Total_Actual_Charge

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the next alert. This is a computed field, which is used internally by the shipment monitor to proactively identify when the shipment could potentially be realerted on a business exception as per the monitor rules setup.
Attribute.Name: Next_Alert_Ts

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment confirm updates have been done. This is an internal field, which is used by the confirmShipment API to identify if shipment confirmation updates have already been performed on the shipment. Since there are various ways through which shipment confirmation updates could happen -- receiveIntransitUpdates, closeManifest, or confirmShipment -- it is required that there be an attribute that identifies if the shipment confirmation has indeed been done.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Confirm_Updates_Done

Attribute.Description: This internal field is used by the receiveIntransitUpdates API to identify if delivery updates have already been done. Delivery updates are possible by explicitly invoking the deliverShipment API.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Deliver_Updates_Done

Attribute.Description: This is an internal field that indicates the containerization state of the shipment. The values being: 01 - not containerized, 02 - containerization in progress and 03 - indicating complete containerization. This is updated by all shipment APIs that containerize or uncontainerize. APIs include createShipment, packShipment, unpackShipment, confirmShipment and changeShipment.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Containerized_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the carrier integration is required for the shipment. This is a computed field, and is set to Y if carrier integration is required for domestic or international shipment based on the YFS_SCAC_EX setup for the seller organization.
Attribute.Name: Scac_Integration_Required

Attribute.Description: The packlist type. One of the attributes used in shipment consolidation.
Attribute.Name: Packlist_Type

Attribute.Description: The account number of the customer or buying organization with the carrier. This is used for arriving at the billing account number. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_bill_account.
Attribute.Name: Custcarrier_Account_No

Attribute.Description: A number assigned on the system, if the CARRIER_TYPE of the shipment is PARCEL. A shipment assigned a particular manifest number is picked up by the carrier pick up personnel for purposes of shipment.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment is for a single order.
Attribute.Name: Is_Single_Order

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the lines are entered for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Lines_Entered

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order is available on the system.
Attribute.Name: Order_Available_On_System

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the "allow manual shipment entry" flag in the receiving rule can be overridden.
Attribute.Name: Override_Manual_Shipment_Entry

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the pallet content is to be verified.
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Verify_Pallet_Content

Attribute.Description: Thif flag indicates whether the case content is to be verified.
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Verify_Case_Content

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an overage is allowed for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Overage

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment is manually entered.
Attribute.Name: Manually_Entered

Attribute.Description: This indicates whether an unexpected item can be received in a receipt. The values being: SHIPMENT - Allow receiving of unexpected items in the shipment if the items exist in the order and DO_NOT_ALLOW - Do not allow receiving unexpected items in the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Allow_New_Item_Receipt

Attribute.Description: The order number of the order for the shipment while creating with SingleOrder.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The order header key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The release number of the OrderRelease for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Description: The order release key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The license number if the shipment is meant for export.
Attribute.Name: Export_License_No

Attribute.Description: The export license expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Export_License_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: The delivery method for the Product Line.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Method

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment record has a confirmed appointment status.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Appt_Confirmation

Attribute.Description: The work order key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order appt key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Appt_Key

Attribute.Description: The order classification attribute.
Attribute.Name: Order_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag to indicates whether this shipment can be considered for consolidation with an existing load on our system or with other open shipments.
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Consolidate

Attribute.Description: A consolidated values that is propagated from the order line. This will be populated if we consider department code as a Do Not Mix criteria during the consolidation process.
Attribute.Name: Department_Code

Attribute.Description: A consolidated value that is propagated from the order line. This will be populated if we consider Item Classification Code as a Do Not Mix criteria during the consolidation process.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification

Attribute.Description: The mark for key that is associated with this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Mark_For_Key

Attribute.Description: Mark For Node as identified by the buyer for eg: it could be a person,store,DC.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Mark_For_Node_Id

Attribute.Description: The contact information that is returned by the determineRouting API or by the Response for routing Instructions (EDI 754).
Attribute.Name: Routing_Contact_Info

Attribute.Description: The customer PO # for the order during order creation time. While creating shipments, this value is consolidated across all orders belonging to this shipment and stored in the shipment header.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Po_No

Attribute.Description: The time when the carrier specified on the load is expected to come to pick up the load.This field will be populated optionally as part of the custom dynamic routing transaction.
Attribute.Name: CarrierPickupTime

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order needs to be packed and put away for retrieval at a later date. It needs to be released manually in order to ship the order.
Attribute.Name: Pack_And_Hold

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an ESP check is required. This is a computed flag based on freight terms configuration.
Attribute.Name: Esp_Check_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an appointment is required. This is a computed flag based on Inbound compliance and Outbound Constraints.
Attribute.Name: Is_Appointment_Reqd

Attribute.Description: The information about who supplied us the routing information. Values can be 01(Supplied by Sterling system), 02(Pre Assigned), 03(External System), 04(User Supplied).
Attribute.Name: Routing_Source

Attribute.Description: The reason code detailing as to why the SCAC could not be determined by the determineRouting API.
Attribute.Name: Routing_Error_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the routing guide is maintained by the system, is dynamic, or is not maintained at all.
Attribute.Name: Routing_Guide_Maintained

Attribute.Description: The date by which the shipment has to be definitely shipped. This is stamped as a part of shipment consolidation.
Attribute.Name: Must_Ship_Before_Date

Attribute.Description: The priority code of the shipment. External logic can be built for prioritizing shipments.
Attribute.Name: Priority_Code

Attribute.Description: The estimated price for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Estimated_Price

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether there are any exceptions at the node. Typically, these exceptions are due to insufficient inventory at the node.
Attribute.Name: Has_Node_Exceptions

Attribute.Description: The pay method for the COD amount.Valid values are CASH, CASHIERS_CHECK, BUSINESS_CHECK, MONEY_ORDER, PERSONAL_CHECK, ANY. This will be a common code, with code type COD_PAY_METHOD.
Attribute.Name: COD_Pay_Method

Attribute.Description: If carrier integration is availed for the carrier on the shipment, then the carrier server returns this information. This is a unique number assigned to each shipment when shipped with shipment level integration service.
Attribute.Name: Airway_Bill_No

Attribute.Description: This flag is 'Y' when invoicing is done for the entire shipment.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Complete

Attribute.Description: Date on which the shipment is expected to be picked, packed and vas performed. These may be performed earlier than Expected Shipment Date. Default value of this field is Expected Shipment Date.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Pick_Date

Attribute.Description: The carrier service to be used for the return shipment associated with the outbound shipment.
Attribute.Name: Return_Carrier_Service

Attribute.Description: The entity that pays the freight for the return shipment. Freight Terms determines whether a shipment is Pre Paid, 3rd Party Billing or Collect Billing. The valid value for Pre Paid is PRE, for 3rd Party Billing is TPB and COL for collect billing.
Attribute.Name: Return_Freight_Terms

Attribute.Description: The account number to be used for billing the return shipment.
Attribute.Name: Return_Billing_Account

Attribute.Description: The Break Bulk Node associated with the Scac and Service of the shipment .
Attribute.Name: Break_Bulk_Node

Attribute.Description: The normalized minimum weight of the Break Bulk Node.
Attribute.Name: BBN_Min_Weight

Attribute.Description: The normalized minimum volume of the Break Bulk Node.
Attribute.Name: BBN_Min_Volume

Attribute.Description: The Open Ship Index number to be used for FedEx Shipment Level Integration shipments. It is a generated one-up number.
Attribute.Name: Fedx_Open_Ship_Index

Attribute.Description: The field is used for storing the Internal Transaction Number(ITN), FTSR Exemption Number or XTN returned by Automated Export System(AES) after filing the Shipper's Export Declaration(SED).
Attribute.Name: ITN_No

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Email_Return_Label

Attribute.Description: The profile_id of the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Profile_Id

Attribute.Description: if profile_id is system generated then the flag is set to 'y' and if it is provided by an user exit it is set to 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Profile_ID_Provided_By_Sterling

Attribute.Description: Indicates the level of service required for this shipment. Default is Null.
Attribute.Name: Level_Of_Service

Attribute.Description: Deposit location of picked items of shipment which are waiting for customer pick up in a store. If there are multiple locations, then those should be updated in a comma separated string. Primarily used in store application for backroom picking.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Location

Attribute.Description: The backroom pick user who is currently working on this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_To_User_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: Association Action.
Attribute.Name: AssociationAction

Entity.Description: Stores container header information. Containers are created using packShipment, createShipment or changeShipment API.
Entity.Name: Shipment_Container

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER table.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Container_Key

Attribute.Description: The manifest key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The load key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Load_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the container pipeline.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: The status of the container.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The classification of data on which a particular set of business processes must be applied.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The order header key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Key

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Container_Seq_No

Attribute.Description: The tracking number. If carrier integration is availed for the carrier on the shipment, then this information is returned by the carrier server. This is a unique number assigned to each container that can be used to track individual containers in a shipment.
Attribute.Name: Tracking_No

Attribute.Description: The tracking number for the COD return. If carrier integration is availed for the carrier on the shipment, then this information is returned by the FedEx carrier server. This is a unique number assigned to each container that can be used to track individual containers of a shipment in case of return.
Attribute.Name: COD_Return_Tracking_No

Attribute.Description: The COD amount in the case of return.
Attribute.Name: COD_Amount

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Ucc128code

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to store manifest number generated by sysytem. ManifestKey on shipment container is where the actual manifesting related information is stored for the manifesting process in the system.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: A unique number which helps identify the shipper as well as the goods.
Attribute.Name: Container_Scm

Attribute.Description: The Electronic Product Code used for RFID processes. A unique number which helps identify the shipper as well as the goods.
Attribute.Name: ContainerEpc

Attribute.Description: The type of container. You could use it as an attribute to group containers - either based on size of the container, type of goods that it carries, and so forth.
Attribute.Name: Container_Type

Attribute.Description: The corrugation item key that is associated with this shipment container.
Attribute.Name: Corrugation_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The length of the container. The units of length are as specified by the CONTAINER_LENGTH_UOM attribute.
Attribute.Name: Container_Length

Attribute.Description: The width of the container. The units of width are as specified by the CONTAINER_WIDTH_UOM attribute.
Attribute.Name: Container_Width

Attribute.Description: The height of the container. The units of height are as specified by the CONTAINER_HEIGHT_UOM attribute.
Attribute.Name: Container_Height

Attribute.Description: The weight of the container, inclusive of weights of items and packing material used, if any. The unit of weight is as specified by the CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT_UOM attribute.
Attribute.Name: Container_Gross_Weight

Attribute.Description: The weight of just the items in the container. This does not include weight of the packing material. The unit of weight is as specified by the CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT_UOM attribute.
Attribute.Name: Container_Net_Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of length specified in CONTAINER_LENGTH attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Length_Uom

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of height specified in CONTAINER_HEIGHT attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Height_Uom

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of width specified in CONTAINER_WIDTH attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Width_Uom

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Gross_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Net_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the units of weight specified in APPLIED_WEIGHT attribute of this container.
Attribute.Name: Applied_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this container is a parent container. Parent containers have other containers.
Attribute.Name: Has_Other_Containers

Attribute.Description: The carrier bill account. If CARRIER_PAYMENT_TYPE is Prepaid (PRE), then carrier bill account is denormalized from YFS_SCAC_EX.account_1 for the ship node. If CARRIER_PAYMENT_TYPE is Third Party Billing(TPB), then if Delivery Code on the shipment is ENTERPRISE, then the carrier bill account is denormalized from YFS_SCAC_EX.account_1 for the Enterprise, Else if the Delivery Code is MARKETPLACE, then the carrier bill account is denormalized from YFS_SCAC_EX.account. If none of the above conditions are satisfied, then the carrier bill account is denormalized from YFS_SHIPMENT.CustCarrier_account_no.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Bill_Account

Attribute.Description: The entity that pays the freight. Delivery code on the shipment is used to arrive at the carrier type. If delivery code is SUPPLIER, then carrier payment type is Prepaid (PRE), which implies supplier pays the freight. If delivery code is ENTERPRISE or MARKETPLACE, then if ship node shipping the product belongs to the organization, then carrier payment type is Prepaid (PRE), else it is Third Party Billing (TPB). Else delivery code on the shipment is used as is to arrive at the carrier payment type.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: This is a part of the unique key. ShipmentSubLineNo along with the ShipmentLineNo is used to identify the logical kit component shipment line. The value of this field is zero - for kit parent shipment lines and shipment lines with items that are not kit components, and greater than zero if the the shipment line corresponds to a logical kit component item.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Sub_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The Bundle parent's shipment line key. If this line is a bundle component, this key will point to the parent shipment line.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Shipment_Line_Key

Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Name: Prime_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The sub line number of the corresponding order line.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Line_No

Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The product class.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The weight of the items in the shipment. The unit of weight is as specified by the NetWeightUom attribute.
Attribute.Name: Net_Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of net weight.
Attribute.Name: Net_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: The country of origin.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment line quantity. Entering a quantity is mandatory when creating a shipment line.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity over picked for the shipment line.
Attribute.Name: Over_Ship_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The original quantity of the shipment line. This will never be decreased but will be increased when quantity is increased.
Attribute.Name: Original_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The number of components required for one kit.
Attribute.Name: Kit_Qty

Attribute.Description: The requested tag number of the item. Thids is a part of the unique business key.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Tag_No

Attribute.Description: The requested serial number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The description of item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Description

Attribute.Description: The segment of inventory customized for an order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The segment type of inventory customized for an order.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The quantity that is not available at the node.
Attribute.Name: Shortage_Qty

Attribute.Description: The customer PO # for the order during createorder time. While creating shipments, this values is consolidated acroos all orders belonging to this shipment and stored in the shipment header.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Po_No

Attribute.Description: The customer PO # for the order during createorder time. While creating shipments, this values is consolidated acroos all orders belonging to this shipment and stored in the shipment header.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Po_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The mark for key that is associated with this shipment line.
Attribute.Name: Mark_For_Key

Attribute.Description: Mark For Node as identified by the buyer for eg: it could be a person,store,DC.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Mark_For_Node_Id

Attribute.Description: The order classification attribute.
Attribute.Name: Order_Type

Attribute.Description: It is a consolidation group id that is used as a standard do not mix constraint. Releases belonging to same shipment consolidation group may consolidate to same shipment.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Consolidation_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The ship to identifier. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Customer_Id

Attribute.Description: The kit code of the item, if it is a Kit item.
Attribute.Name: Kit_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this shipment line can be picked or not.This flag is set to 'N' only for Logical Kit Parent line.
Attribute.Name: Is_Pickable

Attribute.Description: A Consolidated values that is propogated from the order line.This will be populated if we consider Department Code as a Do Not Mix criteria during the consolidation process.
Attribute.Name: Department_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment line is a gift item.
Attribute.Name: Gift_Flag

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the external release. This attribute along with OrderNo and ReleaseNo will uniquely identify the order release external to the system.
Attribute.Name: External_Release_Identifier

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the shipment line is for hazardous item or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Hazmat

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the level at which the Return Shipping Label should be generated for the item present in the shipment line. Valid values are N,S and P. N indicates that the item does not require return label, S indicates that the item requires return label at SKU level and P indicates that the item requires retun label at package level. If the value for the field is not passed, it is defaulted to the corresponding value of the item.
Attribute.Name: Return_Shipping_Label_Level

Attribute.Description: Indicates the level of service required for this shipment line. Default from corresponding order release.
Attribute.Name: Level_Of_Service

Attribute.Description: Pick Location of the line item in a store sales floor or backroom. Primarily used in store application for backroom picking.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Location

Attribute.Description: Pick Location Sequence of the pick location for the line. Used in store application for suggesting picks to user in a sequential manner.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Location_Seq

Attribute.Description: This field is used to assign a decimal value to each line for the purpose of sorting them in a specific sequence.
Attribute.Name: Group_Sequence_Num
